name: Electro Hypostasis
desc:
Code name: Aleph. A high-purity Electro entity.
Elemental hypostases are the highest forms of elemental structures, usually formed either at a location bursting with elemental energy or at a clogged ley line.
Elemental hypostases have developed various attacks based on their elemental attributes.

value.name: Electro Hypostasis
value.desc:
Electro Hypostasis

Code name: Aleph. A high-purity Electro entity.

Even if you win at rock-paper-scissors, Aleph is not one to admit defeat.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Lightning Prism
dropMaterial.desc:
An Electro Hypostasis channels nearby elemental energy to repair damaged elemental entities. Contains the essence of Electro energy.
An ordinary prism separates white light into its component colors; a Lightning Prism, however, channels flowing energies and weaves them into lightning. It will continue to do so even after the Electro Hypostasis has been defeated.

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
It should hold absolute control over this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
"It should hold absolute control over this world.
"It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

customize.text: Protects itself with a cubical shell that is elementally inert. Attacks are only effective when its <color=#ffe14b>elemental core</color> is exposed. When HP is low, it splits into three crystalline prisms that can absorb elemental energy. Make sure to destroy them all.

<color=#ffd780>The PRISM Program</color>
Break all of an Electro Hypostasis' Revival Prisms before it can be revived.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Force Field Erosion</color>
Destroy the Electro Hypostasis' barrier.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>"...Lizard-Spock"</color>
Have one character get hit by all three parts of the rock-paper-scissors attack consecutively.

customize.name: Primogem

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>...And Still Smiling!</color>
Defeat an Electro Hypostasis in Co-Op Mode.
